content: Hello! This is XYZ home services. How can I assist you with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC needs today?
Congratulations! You've won a free vacation! Call 1800-SPAMNOW to claim now!
It seems like this is an unsolicited promotional message. We are marking this contact as spam and will not engage further. If this is a mistake, please let us know.
reason: Customer sent unsolicited promotional spam message
